meanings.definition: A blue pigment obtained from cobalt ore.
meanings.sent1: The artist used zaffer to create a beautiful blue painting.
meanings.sent2: The sky was painted with a vibrant zaffer hue.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child accidentally spilled zaffer all over the floor, turning it blue.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like zaffer under the bright sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The zaffer pigment added a touch of elegance to the artwork.

meanings.sent1: The ocean displayed various shades of zaffer under the clear sky.
meanings.sent2: She loved to wear dresses in the calming shade of zaffer.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party decorations were filled with balloons in zaffer tones.
meanings.sent4: The sadness in her eyes was reflected in the deep zaffer of the evening sky.
meanings.sent5: The zaffer color of the flowers brightened up the room.
